attributes.action: Fine people who don’t put plastic bags in the bin
attributes.additional_details: I would like people to throw there litter in the bin and not being uncareless and care about the planet and the environment that we live in
attributes.background: In my local park  people leave rubbish on the grounds and they don’t throw it away they don’t care  for example plastic bags, beer,cans and bottles and each time I visit  my park their make it so unorganised that I can’t take it

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for fining people. In any case, it's already possible for people littering to be fined, so we're not sure what additional action you'd like to see.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
